paragraphs.text: My mother still speaks with fondness and great humility of the moment she first met the immigration officer that greeted us when we landed in Vancouver. Arriving to any country as a refugee is unimaginably difficult, we essentially begged to be allowed in. The border officer hugged my mother closely and told her that we were welcomed in Canada. She was right; we had made it to our new home.
paragraphs.name: 24bc
24bc
paragraphs.text: My mother still speaks with fondness and great humility of the moment she first met the immigration officer that greeted us when we landed in Vancouver. Arriving to any country as a refugee is unimaginably difficult, we essentially begged to be allowed in. The border officer hugged my mother closely and told her that we were welcomed in Canada. She was right; we had made it to our new home.

c28badfcbddc.title: Being open to take in refugees is not the same as having “open borders”.

paragraphs.text: Being open to take in refugees is not the same as having “open borders”. A country cannot have “open borders” otherwise there is no safety for the citizens and no sense in them paying taxes if anyone can come in and take advantage of the system. Please don’t conflate “open to refugees” with “open borders”.
paragraphs.name: 875c

1cb15f44f4b1.title: Thank you, Yashar, for sharing your story — and for so clearly naming the connections between your…

paragraphs.text: Thank you, Yashar, for sharing your story — and for so clearly naming the connections between your family’s journey and how that’s an underpinning for your current successes. And, the call for open global borders — there is so much that makes humane sense with that approach. I wish you and your family well and thriving!
paragraphs.name: 3b5b

paragraphs.text: How being a refugee prepared me for life as an entrepreneur

paragraphs.text: I am an Iranian-Canadian tech CEO, a refugee, and two-time political prisoner. I arrived to Canada in 1992 at age six with my mother. Now, 25 years later, I am grateful to my parents for standing firmly for their vision of the…

f69ef7549bf1.title: thanks for this extraordinary story Yahsar!

paragraphs.text: thanks for this extraordinary story Yahsar! so great to stumble upon it the same day I published my piece on the pains and redemption of being uprooted calling for us all to draw more inspiration and practical advice from immigrant experience. your story is a glowing example of the sentiment.
paragraphs.name: e401

ae3cccfc583f.title: When it comes to anything governmental, Canada is a predator.

paragraphs.text: When it comes to anything governmental, Canada is a predator. I have been a finance guy who extended credit to Canadian companies and found that Canadian banks have the right to call loans without benefit of a court and then will lie to foreign vendors to get them to ship additional goods while they start to dismantle a company…It happened to my…
paragraphs.name: d4dc

paragraphs.text: Totally inspirational Yashar Nejati. Thank you for sharing the parallels between entrepreneurship and the refugee. I look forward to reading more about your journey.
paragraphs.name: 2fb9

paragraphs.text: Can’t hold back the tears. Feeling I could hug your mum also. The kindness which springs from some human hearts is enough to light up the world for a moment!
paragraphs.name: dd9b

e37a42a8bc1c.title: Thank you for sharing your story.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for sharing your story. My husband is half Persian and his dad lost everything to bring his children to the states in the 70s. He started all over again and became a successful business owner. I have so much respect for my father in law and for your mother too. To have lost her husband/your dad so young and still do whatever she could to…
paragraphs.name: e6fb

23f16032f753.title: Thank you for sharing this personal tale and the role of a single immigration officer in easing…

paragraphs.text: Thank you for sharing this personal tale and the role of a single immigration officer in easing your family’s entrance. These are issues of policy and geopolitics but also deeply personal. Everyone has social impact. I hope more officers and other people open their hearts and border policies. And, on a more personal note, my shoulders shook with…
paragraphs.name: 1a30

25931fc153ba.title: Canada does not have a wide open immigration approach.

paragraphs.text: My story is just one of thousands that exemplify how Canada’s welcoming approach to immigration spurs innovation and prosperity for the nation.
paragraphs.name: ea8a

paragraphs.text: Canada does not have a wide open immigration approach. Certainly not compared to the USA’s huge numbers and I believe we are considered behind the UK and many other European…

virtuals.subtitle: Something that would ‘exemplify’ Canada’s predatory approach would be ‘Pay to Play’ and the 1000’s of ‘Fuer Dai’, Chinese rich kids/anchors…

88656ca878ce.title: Touching story but you forget one fact of nature.

paragraphs.text: Touching story but you forget one fact of nature. Everyone cannot win, once you open the borders to “everyone” you lose your country, your culture and all of the good things you fled to escape in the the old country. You bring “there” here. Nature is harsh.
paragraphs.name: 6b43

virtuals.subtitle: For everyone of “you” that come from some other country, you take away the chance for a better life from someone born in Canada that is…
